_UnhandledExceptionPage.UnhandledSubtitle4:
This isn't a major issue, but we thought we should let you know:
Due to miHoYo A/B testing, Collapse does not support reading the following key: App_Settings_h2319593470.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

_SettingsPage.Debug_IncludeGameLogs: Save Game logs to Collapse's (might contain sensitive data)
_SettingsPage.Debug_SendRemoteCrashData: Send anonymous crash reports to developers
_SettingsPage.Debug_SendRemoteCrashData_EnvVarDisablem: This setting is disabled due to 'DISABLE_SENTRY' environment variable being set to true.
_SettingsPage.Debug_MultipleInstance: Allow running multiple instances of Collapse
_SettingsPage.ChangeRegionWarning_Warning: *You need to restart the app for this setting to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppLang_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app for language changes to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppThemes_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app for theme changes to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppBG_Note_Regional: Regional specific custom background settings is in "Quick Settings" button in the home page.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help1: This thread will handle how many chunks will be split while downloading files. This mechanism behaves in the same way as what IDM and aria2c do.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help5: This thread will handle the extraction/verification process while installing/repairing the game.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help6: Note: This setting is no longer effective while installing Honkai Impact 3rd.
_SettingsPage.SophonHelp_1: "Sophon" is a new download mechanism introduced by HoYoVerse recently and allows files to be downloaded into "chunks" rather than downloading a big ZIP archive. The benefits are mainly a lower drive space requirement and increased efficiency for downloads and updates.
_SettingsPage.SophonHelp_2: This method might be slower for those who uses Hard Drives for their game.
_SettingsPage.SophonHelp_Indicator1: File Size to Write on Disk
_SettingsPage.SophonHelp_Thread: This controls number of simultaneous chunks download Collapse is doing. Lower this value if you get sudden stuck when downloading.
_SettingsPage.SophonHelp_Http: This controls maximum number of network connection being established by Collapse to download the chunks.
_SettingsPage.SophonPredownPerfMode_Toggle: [EXPERIMENTAL] Use all CPU cores when applying pre-download
_SettingsPage.SophonPredownPerfMode_Tooltip: Enabling this will set CPU threads to maximum available for your system. Disable if you get any problems.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Attention4: the value if you have an existing download as it might
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Attention6: due to the session count needed for the download do not match.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_AttentionTop1: The issues below will no longer occur if you have
_SettingsPage.DiscordRPC_GameStatusToggle: Show current game on Discord status
_SettingsPage.VideoBackground_IsEnableAcrylicBackgroun: Use Acrylic Effect while using Video Background
_SettingsPage.Update_LatestVer: You are using the latest version.
_SettingsPage.AppFiles_ClearMetadataDialogHelp:
Clearing Collapse metadata will cause Collapse to forcefully restart. Only use this if you have problems with region loading.
Are you sure?
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer1: This app is not affiliated with
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer3: and completely open-sourced. Any contribution is welcomed.
_SettingsPage.LowerCollapsePrioOnGameLaunch: Lower Collapse process resource usage when a game is launched
_SettingsPage.LowerCollapsePrioOnGameLaunch_Tooltip: Disables Carousel in main page and lower Collapse's priority to Below Normal
_SettingsPage.AppBehavior_LaunchOnStartup: Automatically start Collapse when your computer boots up
_SettingsPage.AppBehavior_StartupToTray: Hide Collapse window when it started up automatically
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Help:
Use Waifu2X to enlarge background images.
When turned on, the image quality is significantly improved, but it will take a little more time to load the image for the first time.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Warning_CpuMode: WARNING: No available Vulkan GPU device was found and CPU mode will be used. This will greatly increase image processing time.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Warning_D3DMappingLayers: WARNING: Your system has the "OpenCL™, OpenGL®, and Vulkan® Compatibility Pack" installed. It is reported to be incompatible with the Vulkan Loader and will crash on some GPUs. Please remove this package to enable GPU mode.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Error_Loader: ERROR: Failed to initialize Vulkan Loader. Make sure you have a Vulkan-compatible GPU with a proper GPU driver installed.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Error_Output: ERROR: Failed to pass Waifu2X self-test, got an empty output image.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Initializing: Waifu2X is initializing, please wait a moment.
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Proxy_HostnameHelp1: Represents the URL of the Proxy to use.
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Proxy_HostnameHelp4: type of proxy at the moment.
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_ProxyWarn_UrlInvalid: The URL entered is not valid!
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_ProxyWarn_NotSupported: The proxy scheme is not supported! Collapse only supports http://, https://, socks4://, socks4a:// and socks5://
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Proxy_UsernameHelp3: Leave this field empty if your proxy doesn't require authentication.
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Proxy_PasswordHelp3: Leave this field empty if your proxy doesn't require authentication.
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_ProxyTest_ButtonFailed: Test Failed! Proxy is not Reachable
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Dns_ConnectionType_Toolt: Represents the type of which DNS Protocol to be used to query the record. There are few types of Protocol supported by Collapse Launcher, including:
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Dns_ProviderSelection_To: There are few available External DNS Provider built into Collapse Launcher. You can also use your own custom DNS Provider/Server by selecting "Custom" as the selection under "DNS Provider".
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Dns_CustomProvider_Toolt: selection, you can add your own custom DNS Provider/Server by entering its IPv4/IPv6 or hostname. You can also add pre-defined DNS Provider (which starts with '$' symbol) alongside your custom DNS Provider/Server by separating each entry with these symbols:
_SettingsPage.NetworkSettings_Dns_ChangesWarning: You need to restart the app for any DNS settings changes to take effect.
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_SpeedLimitHelp4: Limits the maximum allowed bandwidth for downloading. This setting cannot be used alongside the
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_NewPreallocChunk_Su: For Game Installation, Game Repair and Cache Updates only.
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_NewPreallocChunkHel: When enabled, the downloader will dynamically pre-allocate the file size during its download.
This enables the downloader to directly writes data chunks into the file without splitting it into separate files.
When disabled, the launcher will use the old allocation method, where data chunks will be written into separate files. It will also disable the
This feature is only available for game installation (such as Initial Install, Update, and Pre-load), Game Repair, and Cache Update steps.
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_BurstDownload_Subti: For Game Repair and Cache Updates only.
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_BurstDownloadHelp2: When enabled, this feature will allow the download process on
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_BurstDownloadHelp4: features to run in parallel to make the download process more efficient.
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_BurstDownloadHelp5: When disabled, the download process for
_SettingsPage.FileDownloadSettings_BurstDownloadHelp7: features will use a sequential download process.
_SettingsPage.Database_ConnectFail: Failed to connect to the database, see error(s) below:
_SettingsPage.Database_Error_InvalidGuid: User ID is not a valid GUID!

_Misc.MissingVcRedistSubtitle:
You need to install the Visual C/C++ Redistributable to run this function. Do you want to download it now?
Note: This will open a browser window and download a file from Microsoft. Please run the installer after downloading it then restart Collapse and try again.
If you have already installed it but the error remains, please send a issue ticket to us.
_Misc.ExceptionFeedbackBtn_Unavailable: Crash report is disabled or not available
_Misc.ExceptionFeedbackTemplate_Message: Tell us what happened after this line: (You don't need to include the error message, we will attach it for you!)
_Misc.FeedbackSendFailure: Failed to send feedback! Check logs/console for more info.
_Misc.Generic_GameFeatureDeprecation: Due to unforeseen game changes, this feature has been deprecated and will be removed in the future. Using this feature may cause unexpected behavior.

_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedTitle: Warning: Delta Patch Update is Detected!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedSubtitle:
Delta patch will be used to update your game from {0} to {1}.
Remember that you may still need to download some files in-game.

Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPrevFailedTitle: Previous Delta Patch has been incorrectly applied or failed to finish applying!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Delta Patch failed to apply. Do you want to restore your game to prevent a redownload?
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPreReqTitle: Additional File Download is Required for Delta Patch!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPreReqSubtitle1: Additional file download is required for this game before applying delta patch. Around
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPreReqSubtitle2: is required to be downloaded and some of these files might contains audio package deltas.
_Dialogs.GameConversionPrevFailedTitle: Previous Game Conversion either failed or was not completed!
_Dialogs.GameConversionPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Game Conversion failed. Do you want to restore your game to prevent from redownloading?
_Dialogs.PreloadVerifiedSubtitle: Your pre-load package is verified and ready for installation!
_Dialogs.LocateInstallSubtitle: Before Installing the Game, Do you want to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.ChooseAudioLangSubtitle: Before installing the game, you need to choose which audio language you want to use (Default: Japanese):
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadNeededSubtitle:
You must download at least {0} of additional/persistent files. You can also skip this process and download it in-game instead.
Would you like to download them now?
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadCompletedSubtitle:
Additional/Persistent Download has been completed! 
Happy gaming!
_Dialogs.ExtremeGraphicsSettingsWarnSubtitle:
You are about to set the setting preset to Very High!
Very High setting preset is essentially a 1.6x Render Scale with MSAA Enabled and is VERY UNOPTIMIZED!

Are you sure you want to use this setting?
_Dialogs.MigrateExistingInstallChoiceTitle: An Existing Installation of {0} is Detected!
_Dialogs.MigrateExistingInstallChoiceSubtitle1: You have an existing installation of the game using {0} on this directory:
_Dialogs.MigrateExistingInstallChoiceSubtitle2: You have an option to move your existing game data into another directory or use the current directory as the existing one. It's recommended that you use the current directory as the one already installed to ensure that you can still launch your game using {0}.
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSubtitle:
Game has already been installed at:

{0}

It is recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher for better support and integration.
Rest assured, you can still use Official Launcher to start the game.

Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallBHI3LSubtitle:
Game has already been installed at:

{0}

It is recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher for better support and integration.
Rest assured, you can still use BetterHi3Launcher to start the game.

Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSteamSubtitle:
Game has already been installed on Steam at:

{0}

Do you wish to convert this version to the Non-Steam Global version?
Note: Once you initiate the conversion, you can no longer log-in with your Steam account. Only the miHoYo/HoYoverse account login method will be available.

Do you wish to proceed with the conversion and migration?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertNeedMigrateSubtitle:
You need to migrate the game installation folder to another location as Collapse does not have permission to write to that directory.
It is recommended to move the location to the CollapseLauncher game folder.

Do you want to move it to the CollapseLauncher game folder?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertIntegrityDoneSubtitle:
Game Data Integrity check complete! The conversion process will download at least {0} of files.
You can continue or cancel and come back later.

Do you wish to start the conversion process?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertFailedSubtitle:
Conversion process has failed! :(
Please try to start the conversion process again.
_Dialogs.InstallCorruptDataAnywaySubtitle1: You're about to extract this corrupted data:
_Dialogs.InstallCorruptDataAnywaySubtitle3:
. Keep in-mind that the extraction for this data might fail or renders the game fail to run.

Are you sure to extract this data anyway?
_Dialogs.InstallDataDownloadResumeSubtitle:
You have downloaded {0}/{1} of the game previously.

Do you want to resume the download?
_Dialogs.MigrationSubtitle: Before migrating, do you wish to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackTitle: Media Feature Pack cannot be found!
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle1: WARNING: Starting from the v5.8 update, Honkai Impact 3rd needs the "Media Feature Pack" to be installed on your PC in order to run properly. This will fix the "Unable to load DLL 'cri_ware_unity'" error in-game.
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle2: You may need to restart your PC after you've installed the "Media Feature Pack". You can safely ignore this warning if you already have it installed or wish to attempt playing Honkai Impact 3rd, but there is a chance that you will get the error while running the game.
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteTitle: Media Feature Pack has been installed!
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteSubtitle:
Media Feature Pack has been installed on your PC.
Please restart your PC to apply the patch!
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle1: The Launcher Scope's config is broken. Please choose your previous game path manually.
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle2:
Make sure that the location of the game is not the same as the path of your launcher's "config.ini" file, which is found at:

{0}
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle3: If the above is valid, please move all of your game files to another location, then click on "Locate directory" to choose the path.
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle1:
Please locate the downloaded Cookbook before starting the process.
If you haven't downloaded it yet,
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle3: to download the Cookbook file and then click
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle5: to locate the downloaded Cookbook file before continuing.
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle7: Here is the name of the Cookbook file you need to download:
_Dialogs.PrivilegeMustRunSubtitle: Collapse requires administrative privileges to function properly. Would you like to restart Collapse and run it as administrator?
_Dialogs.ReleaseChannelChangeSubtitle1: You are about to change your release channel to:
_Dialogs.ReleaseChannelChangeSubtitle3: This action may cause irreversible changes and/or cause things to break from your current setup. We are not responsible for any loss or corruption of data associated with your game.
_Dialogs.ForceUpdateCurrentInstallSubtitle1: You are about to perform a forced-update to your current:
_Dialogs.ForceUpdateCurrentInstallSubtitle2: installation and we recommend you to close your currently opened game(s).
_Dialogs.ChangePlaytimeTitle: Are you sure you want to change your playtime?
_Dialogs.ChangePlaytimeSubtitle:
Changing your playtime means overwriting the current value with the one you just inputted. 

Do you wish to proceed?

Note: This has no impact on how Collapse operates and you can change this value again at any time when not playing the game.
_Dialogs.ResetPlaytimeTitle: Are you sure you want to reset your playtime?
_Dialogs.ResetPlaytimeSubtitle: Resetting your playtime means setting the playtime counter and all related statistics back to 0. This is a
_Dialogs.ResetPlaytimeSubtitle3:
action, meaning that you cannot undo this once you confirm. 

Do you wish to proceed?

Note: This has no impact on how Collapse operates and you can change this value again at any time when not playing the game.
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeTitle: There was a problem saving this session's playtime
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeSubtitle1: The difference between the starting and ending times results in a negative number.
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeSubtitle2: A fallback value is saved every minute and will be used instead:
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeSubtitle3: Please refrain from adjusting the computer clock while in-game.
_Dialogs.LocateExePathSubtitle: Please point Collapse to the location of your application's executable:
_Dialogs.CannotUseAppLocationForGameDirSubtitle: You can't use this folder as it is being used as a system folder or being used for main executable of the app. Please choose another folder!
_Dialogs.InvalidGameDirNew1Subtitle: You can't use this folder as it is being used as a system folder or being used for main executable of the app. Please choose another folder!
_Dialogs.InvalidGameDirNew2Subtitle: The launcher does not have permission to access this folder!
_Dialogs.InvalidGameDirNew3Subtitle: You have selected a path on top of the root drive, which is forbidden!
_Dialogs.InvalidGameDirNew4Subtitle: You cannot use Windows folder as Game Installation Location to avoid any unnecessary that might happen.
_Dialogs.InvalidGameDirNew5Subtitle: You cannot use Program Data folder as Game Installation Location to avoid any unnecessary that might happen.
_Dialogs.InvalidGameDirNew6Title: Cannot select Program Files or Program Files (x86) folder
_Dialogs.InvalidGameDirNew6Subtitle: You cannot use Program Files or Program Files (x86) folder as Game Installation Location to avoid any unnecessary that might happen.
_Dialogs.StopGameSubtitle:
Are you sure you want to force stop current running game?
You may lose some in-game progress.
_Dialogs.MeteredConnectionWarningSubtitle: Your current internet connection was detected as being 'Metered'! Continuing the update process may incur additional charges from your internet provider. Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.ResetKbShortcutsTitle: Are you sure you want to reset all shortcuts?
_Dialogs.ResetKbShortcutsSubtitle:
This means every shortcut will be changed to their default key combination. 

Do you wish to proceed?

Note: This has no impact on how Collapse operates and you can still change the combination of shortcuts by accessing the Keyboard Shortcuts menu.
_Dialogs.OperationErrorDiskSpaceInsufficientTitle: Disk Space for Drive: {0} is Insufficient!
_Dialogs.OperationErrorDiskSpaceInsufficientMsg:
You do not have enough free space to do the operation on your {2} drive!

Free Space: {0}
Required Space: {1}.

Please ensure that you have enough disk space before proceeding.
_Dialogs.OperationWarningNotCancellableTitle: Attention: This Operation is NOT CANCELLABLE!
_Dialogs.OperationWarningNotCancellableMsg1: You might need to check that you don't have any heavy tasks running on your computer to avoid possible issues while the process is running. Keep in-mind that you
_Dialogs.GenericWarningExceptionSubtitle: This isn't a major issue, but we thought we should let you know:
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to continue?
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle1: A shortcut will be created in the following path:
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle2: If there is already a shortcut with the same name in this folder, it will be replaced.
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmCheckBox: Automatically start game after using this shortcut
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle1: A shiny new shortcut was created!
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle4: • Using this shortcut will start the game after loading the region.
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle5: • If the game is not installed/updated, Collapse will try to install/update it. Please note that dialogs related to these processes will still be shown.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to continue?
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle1: A shortcut will be added to every Steam user in this computer.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle2: If already added, the assets related to the shortcut will be verified.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmCheckBox: Automatically start game after using this shortcut
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle1: A new shiny shortcut was added to every Steam users in this computer!
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle3: • Using this shortcut will start the game after loading the region.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle4: • Running this process again will fix any corrupted/missing images belonging to the shortcut.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle5: • New shortcuts will only be shown after Steam is reloaded.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle6: • In order to use the Steam overlay, Steam needs to be run as administrator and Collapse must either be fully closed or have the "Multiple Instances" option enabled in the settings.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle7: • If the game is not installed/updated, Collapse will try to install/update it. Please note that dialogs related to these processes will still be shown.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationFailureSubtitle:
It was not possible to find a valid userdata folder.

Please be sure to login at least once to the Steam client before trying to use this functionality.
_Dialogs.DbGenerateUid_Title: Are you sure you wish to change your user ID?
_Dialogs.DbGenerateUid_Content: Changing the current user ID will cause the associated data to be lost if you lose it.
_Dialogs.SophonIncrementUpdateUnavailTitle: Incremental Update is Unavailable: Version is Too Obsolete!
_Dialogs.SophonIncrementUpdateUnavailSubtitle3: and incremental update for your version is not available. However, you could still update your game by re-downloading the entire thing from scratch.
_Dialogs.SophonIncrementUpdateUnavailSubtitle4: Click "{0}" to continue updating the entire thing or click "{1}" to cancel the process
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableUpdateTitle: Additional Packages are Available to Update!
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableDownloadTitl: Additional Packages are Available to Download!
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableSubtitle1: Your game has additional packages that can be downloaded. The size of the additional data is:
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableSubtitle2: . In total, you may require to download:
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableSubtitle3: of data if you wish to include the additional packages.
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableSubtitle5: if you want to download the additional package or click
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableSubtitle6: if you only need to download the base files with only:
_Dialogs.SophonAdditionalPkgAvailableFootnote2: You might be required to download the additional packages later in-game if you choose to download the base files only.
_Dialogs.UACWarningContent:
Disabling User Account Control (UAC) is never a good idea.
The security of the OS will be compromised and the game may not run properly.

Click the "Learn More" button to see how to enable UAC.
The related entry is: Run all administrators in Admin Approval Mode.
_Dialogs.EnsureExitSubtitle: There are critical operations running in the background.
_Dialogs.EnsureExitSubtitle2: Are you sure you want to exit?

_FileMigrationProcess.LocateFolderSubtitle: Choose the location to move the file/folder to the target path.
_FileMigrationProcess.ChoosePathErrorPathIdentical:
The output path you choose is within or identical to the current location!
Please move to another location!
_FileMigrationProcess.ChoosePathErrorPathUnselected: Please choose your path before continue!
_FileMigrationProcess.ChoosePathErrorPathNoPermission: You don't have a permission to access this location! Please choose another location!

_InstallMgmt.RepairFilesRequiredSubtitle:
You have at least {0} files ({1}) that need to be repaired before updating!

Note: This process may takes longer than expected (as it depends on the stability and bandwidth of your connection). Consider using a VPN if you have slow download speeds :)

_InstallConvert.PageFooter3: close the launcher while the conversion process is running
_InstallConvert.SelectDialogSubtitle:
Note: This conversion will break the integration with the default launcher if you have installed this game by migrating it.

Please choose your source and target game to be converted:
_InstallConvert.SelectDialogSubtitleNotInstalled: Source game not Installed! Please choose another game.
_InstallConvert.ConvertSuccessSubtitle: Game Conversion from {0} to {1} has been successfully completed!
_InstallConvert.CookbookDownloadSubtitle: Downloading recipe for conversion from {0} to {1}
_InstallConvert.CancelMsgSubtitle1:
You are about to cancel the conversion process. Any conversion progress will be aborted.

Are you sure?
_InstallConvert.CancelMsgSubtitle2:
You are about to cancel the conversion process but your game has been already converted to {0}. You'll be skipping the "Post-Conversion Integrity Verification" phase.

Are you sure?

_InstallMigrateSteam.Step2Subtitle1: Migration process will be running in 5 seconds.
_InstallMigrateSteam.Step3Title: Comparing Game Data Integrity for Conversion
_InstallMigrateSteam.PageFooter3: switch to another page or close the launcher while the process is running
_InstallMigrateSteam.SelectDialogSubtitle:
Note: This conversion will break the integration with default launcher if you have installed this game by migrating it.

Please choose your source and target game to be converted:
_InstallMigrateSteam.SelectDialogSubtitleNotInstalled: Source game not installed! Please choose another game.
_InstallMigrateSteam.ConvertSuccessSubtitle: Game Conversion from {0} to {1} has been successfully completed!

_InstallMigrate.Step1Title: Process will start in 5 seconds. Please accept the UAC dialog to start the migration process
_InstallMigrate.Step2Title: Migration is in progress. You may see a console window pop up. Please wait until the process is completed
_InstallMigrate.Step3Title: Migration process is done! Returning in a moment...
_InstallMigrate.StepCancelledTitle: Migration canceled! Returning in a moment...
_InstallMigrate.PageFooter3: switch to another page or close the launcher while the process is running

_UpdatePage.UpdateForcedHeader: The launcher will be forcely updated due to urgent changes to ensure the launcher to work properly.
_UpdatePage.UpdateStatus4: You're using the latest version ({0}) now!
_UpdatePage.UpdateMessage4: Returning to game launcher scope shortly...
_UpdatePage.UpdateCountdownMessage1: Your launcher will be updated in {0}...
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateCDNSelectorSubtitle: Select the CDN options and click "{0}" to start the update!
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateCDNSelectorSubtitleCount: The CDN will be automatically selected in: {0}
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateErrCollapseRunTitle: Please close Collapse before applying the update!
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateErrCollapseRunTitleWarnBox: An Instance of Collapse Launcher is Still Running!
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateErrCollapseRunSubtitleWarnBox: We detected an instance of Collapse Launcher is running in the background. To forcely close the launcher, click "Yes". To wait until you manually close it, click "No".
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateErrVelopackStateBrokenSubtitl:
We detected that you have a broken existing installation.

Click on "Yes" to repair the installation before installing updates or Click "No" to just run the update installation.
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateErrReleaseFileNotFoundTitle:
ERROR:
"release" file doesn't have "stable" or "preview" string in it
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateErrReleaseFileNotFoundSubtitl: Please check your "release" file and try again.
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateTaskLegacyVerFoundTitle: A previous legacy installation of Collapse v{0} detected!
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateTaskLegacyVerFoundSubtitle1: We detected that you have a legacy Collapse v{0} installed on your PC.
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateTaskLegacyVerFoundSubtitle2: The updater needs to clean-up all the old files inside its directory.
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateTaskLegacyVerFoundSubtitle3: Please make sure you don't have any important files inside of the Collapse directory or it will be COMPLETELY WIPED OUT!
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateTaskLegacyVerFoundSubtitle4: Click "Yes" to proceed or "No" to cancel.
_UpdatePage.ApplyUpdateTaskLegacyCleanupCount: Clean-up process will be started in {0}...

_AppNotification.NotifMetadataUpdateSubtitle: New metadata for the launcher is available! This process is automatic and is done to ensure that the launcher can properly communicate with the miHoYo/HoYoverse servers. The update will begin shortly!
_AppNotification.NotifFirstWelcomeSubtitle: To get started, click the "{0}" button below to see how to install or migrate an existing game.
_AppNotification.NotifPreviewBuildUsedTitle: You are using a Preview Build!
_AppNotification.NotifPreviewBuildUsedSubtitle: You are currently using a [PREVIEW] build, which is still being tested. If you encounter any issues, please report them by using the "{0}" button below. Thanks!
_AppNotification.NotifKbShortcutSubtitle:
We are introducing a new way to navigate around Collapse, Keyboard Shortcuts.
You can now use your keyboard to have faster access to some functionalities!

Wanna know more?
Try using CTRL + Tab or click the button below.
_AppNotification.NotifDbConnectedTitle: User synchronization Database is successfully connected!
_AppNotification.NotifDbConnectedSubtitle:
Sync database is now connected and ready to use.
You are connected to {0}.
_AppNotification.NotifDbTokenExpiredTitle: Your Sync Database Token has expired!
_AppNotification.NotifDbTokenExpiredSubtitle:
Your Sync Database Token has expired and you need to re-login to the Sync Database.
Please generate new token and input it in the Sync Database Settings page.

_StarRailGameSettingsPage.Graphics_ResCustomTooltip: Custom Resolution can only be used with Resizable Window enabled
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.Graphics_FPS_Help: 120 FPS is EXPERIMENTAL! Please use with caution as Honkai: Star Rail does not officially support this!
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.Graphics_FPS_Help2:
Setting the FPS value to 120 no longer causes the menu to break, but changing the in-game FPS setting to a lower value will no longer work.
Should you use the 120 FPS option, use Collapse to change the Game Graphics Settings.
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.Graphics_VSync_Help: VSync is not available on 120 FPS
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.OverlayNotInstalledTitle: You cannot use this feature as the region isn't installed or needs to be updated!
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.OverlayNotInstalledSubtitle: Please download/update the game first on the game's launcher page!
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.OverlayGameRunningSubtitle: Please close the game first to use this feature!
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.OverlayFirstTimeTitle: You have never played this game before!
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.OverlayFirstTimeSubtitle: Please run the game first to generate the necessary files, then come back here to use this feature.
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.CustomArgs_Footer1: For more information about the Start-up Argument, please check the
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.CustomArgs_Footer2: Unity Standalone Player command line documentation
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.Language_Help1: Collapse currently cannot download Audio package directly.
_StarRailGameSettingsPage.Language_Help2: Audio package will be downloaded in-game next time you launch the game.

_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_ExclusiveFullscreen_Help: Exclusive Fullscreen might cause random game freezes!
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_VolFogs_ToolTip: Requires Shadow Quality to be set at Medium or higher!
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_HDR_NotSupported1: Your display does not support HDR.
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_HDR_NotEnabled1: Your device supports HDR, but it's not enabled.
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_HDR_NotEnabled2: Option "Use HDR" should be turned on in Windows Settings.
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_HDR_MaxLuminosity_Help: Maximum allowed peak brightness for highlights
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_HDR_Calibration_Help: Adjust until the image shown is faint but visible
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_HDR_UiBrightness_Help: Controls how bright UI elements should be
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Graphics_HDR_SceneBrightness_Help: Controls how bright a scenery should be
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.OverlayNotInstalledTitle: You cannot use this feature as the region isn't installed or needs to be updated!
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.OverlayNotInstalledSubtitle: Please download/update the game first on the game's launcher page!
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.OverlayGameRunningSubtitle: Please close the game first to use this feature!
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.OverlayFirstTimeTitle: You have never played this game before!
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.OverlayFirstTimeSubtitle: Please run the game first to generate the necessary files, then come back here to use this feature.
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.CustomArgs_Footer1: For more information about the Start-up Argument, please check the
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.CustomArgs_Footer2: Unity Standalone Player command line documentation
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Language_Help1: Collapse currently cannot download Audio package directly.
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Language_Help2: Audio package will be downloaded in-game next time you launch the game.

_KbShortcuts.General_OpenMenu_Desc: This can also be accessed through the App Settings page.
_KbShortcuts.General_ReloadRegion_Desc:
Pressing F5 is an alternative to this shortcut.
Please note that reloading the Home Page will reload the region.
_KbShortcuts.Switch_Subtitle: Note: The keybinds follow the selector order.
_KbShortcuts.Switch_ChangeGame_Desc:
You can use the NumPad for this shortcut too!
E.g. {0}+1 or NumPad1 (without the {0} modifier) leads to Honkai Impact 3rd's page (last used region).
_KbShortcuts.Switch_ChangeRegion_Desc: E.g. For Genshin Impact, {0}+1 leads to the Global region.
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_Subtitle: Note: These keybinds only work if such feature is supported in the region.
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_ForceCloseGame_Desc: WARNING: By using this shortcut, the game will be closed without any type of confirmation.
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_GoRepair: Go to the Game Repair page
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_GoSettings: Go to the Game Settings page
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_GoCaches: Go to the Caches Repair page
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Text: Type the new combination for this shortcut!
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Help1: A shortcut is composed by 2 parts:
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Help3: ・ Key - Alphabetical (A to Z) or Tab
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Help4: You can choose any combination consisting of one value from each category, unless it is reserved by the system or is already being used.

_FileCleanupPage.Title: Files Clean-up
_FileCleanupPage.NoFilesToBeDeletedText: No files need to be deleted!

_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsLanguageDescription: This will adjust the language for the information displayed.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsWindowSizeDescripti: Change the size of the launcher.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsCDNDescription: Select your primary Content Delivery Network to be used.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsStyleDescription: Change the look of the launcher and prefer your choice.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsStyleThemeDescripti: Change the color that appear in your launcher.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsStyleCustomBackgrou: Use custom background image instead of default one.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.VideoBackgroundPreviewUnavailableDescrip: You cannot preview your video background in OOBE but do not worry! Your video background will be applied once you are completing OOBE.

_OOBEStartUpMenu.LoadingBackgroundImageSubtitle: The image might take a while to get processed.

_NotificationToast.WindowHiddenToTray_Title: Collapse Launcher is Minimized to Tray
_NotificationToast.WindowHiddenToTray_Subtitle:
The launcher is now running in the background.
Click this notification or the icon on the tray to restore the window.
_NotificationToast.GameUpdateCompleted_Subtitle: {0} has been successfully updated to v{1}!
_NotificationToast.GameRepairCheckCompletedFound_Subtitle: {0} file(s) need to be updated/repaired. Click this notification to go back to the launcher.
_NotificationToast.GameRepairCheckCompletedNotFound_Subtitl: No files need to be updated/repaired.
_NotificationToast.CacheUpdateCheckCompletedFound_Subtitle: {0} cache file(s) need to be updated. Click this notification to go back to the launcher.
_NotificationToast.CacheUpdateCheckCompletedNotFound_Subtit: No cache files need to be updated.
_NotificationToast.CacheUpdateDownloadCompleted_Subtitle: {0} cache file(s) have been successfully updated.
_NotificationToast.GenericClickNotifToGoBack_Subtitle: Click this notification to go back to the launcher.
_NotificationToast.OOBE_WelcomeSubtitle: You are currently selecting {0} - {1} as your game. There are more games awaits you, find out more!
_NotificationToast.LauncherUpdated_NotifSubtitle: Your launcher has been updated to: {0}. Go to "{1}" and click "{2}" to see what changed.
